nodes.short_description: Get ready for an amazing adventure in UBOAT: The Silent Wolf! Assume the role of a submarine commander from World War II, manage your vessel and navigate through treacherous waters in a thrilling STORY CAMPAIGN. Use your skills and dive into the depths in FREE ROAM mode, where you'll discover an expansive world teeming with mysteries and dangers. And if traveling alone gets boring, join the COOPERATIVE MODE and lead a group of four friends to track down enemies together!

Mach dich bereit für ein unglaubliches UBOAT-Abenteuer: The Silent Wolf! Schlüpfe in die Rolle eines U-Boot-Kommandanten aus dem Zweiten Weltkrieg, steuere dein Schiff und navigiere in einer spannenden STORY-KAMPAGNE durch tückische Gewässer. Nutze deine Fähigkeiten und tauche im FREE ROAM-Modus in Tiefen, wo du eine Welt voller Geheimnisse und Gefahren entdeckst. Und willst du nicht allein spielen, kannst du im COOPERATIVE MODE eine Gruppe von vier Freunden anführen und gemeinsam Feinde jagen!

Conviértete en comandante de un submarino de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, gestiona tu embarcación y navega en aguas traicioneras en una emocionante CAMPAÑA DE HISTORIA. Usa tus habilidades y sumérgete en las profundidades en el modo LIBRE, donde descubrirás un vasto mundo repleto de peligros y misterios. Y si viajar solo se te hace aburrido, ¡únete al MODO COOPERATIVO y lidera a un grupo de cuatro amigos para localizar juntos a enemigos!

Prepare-se para uma aventura incrível em UBOAT: The Silent Wolf! Assuma o papel de um comandante de submarino da Segunda Guerra Mundial, administre sua embarcação e navegue por águas traiçoeiras em uma emocionante CAMPANHA DE HISTÓRIA. Use suas habilidades e mergulhe nas profundezas no modo FREE ROAM, onde você descobrirá um mundo extenso repleto de mistérios e perigos. Se viajar sozinho ficar chato, entre no MODO COOPERATIVO e lidere um grupo de quatro amigos para rastrear os inimigos juntos!

유보트(UBOAT): 침묵의 늑대에서 놀라운 모험을 준비해 보세요! 제2차 세계 대전의 잠수함 사령관이 되어 함선을 관리하고 긴장감 넘치는 군사 작전 속에서 위험한 바다를 항해해 보십시오. 자신의 실력을 발휘하고 자유롭게 돌아다닐 수 있는 프리롬(FREE ROAM)모드에서 더욱 깊은 심해로 들어가 보십시오. 그곳에서 신비와 위험으로 가득 찬 광활한 세계를 발견하게 될 것입니다. 혼자 여행하는 것이 지루해진다면, 협력 모드(COUPORATORATION MODE)로 네 명의 친구와 한 그룹으로 움직이며 적을 추적해 보세요.

Endossez le rôle d'un commandant de sous-marin de la Seconde Guerre mondiale, gérez votre navire et naviguez dans des eaux traîtresses dans une CAMPAGNE HISTORIQUE palpitante. Utilisez vos compétences et plongez dans les profondeurs en mode FREE ROAM, où vous découvrirez un vaste monde regorgeant de mystères et de dangers. Et si voyager seul devient ennuyeux, rejoignez le MODE COOPÉRATIF et dirigez un groupe de quatre amis pour traquer ensemble les ennemis !

Przeżyj niezwykłą przygodę w UBOAT: The Silent Wolf! Zostań dowódcą okrętu podwodnego z czasów II Wojny Światowej, zarządzaj nim i nawiguj przez niebezpieczne wody w pełnej napięcia KAMPANII FABULARNEJ. Wykorzystaj swoje umiejętności i wskocz na głęboką wodę w trybie FREE ROAM, gdzie czeka na Ciebie otwarty świat pełen tajemnic i niebezpieczeństw. A jeśli znudzi Cię samotne podróżowanie, wejdź do TRYBU KOOPERACJI i stań na czele 4-osobowej grupy przyjaciół, by wspólnie tropić przeciwników!
UBOAT: The Silent Wolfで、素晴らしい冒険の準備を！第二次世界大戦時に活躍した潜水艦の司令官となり、艦船を操り、危険な海域をスリリングなストーリーで駆け抜けましょう。スキルを駆使して深海に潜るフリーロームモードでは、謎と危険に満ちた広大な世界を発見できます。また、一人旅が退屈になったら、強力モードに参加して、4人の仲間を率いて一緒に敵を追い詰めましょう！

nodes.long_description:
Immerse yourself in the epic world of UBOAT: The Silent Wolf and take on the role of a commander of a legendary World War II submarine. Experience an incredible story in the singleplayer STORY CAMPAIGN or lead a group of four friends in the COOPERATIVE MODE. Together, track down enemies to achieve success on the maritime battlefield and demonstrate the vessel's power!

Engage in thrilling battles with rival vessels. Keep a vigilant eye through the periscope, set up ambushes and watch out for enemy aircrafts.

Feel the true essence of being on board a submarine. Encounter the hardship and dangers that crews had to confront during the monumental global conflict.

Use your skills and dive into the deep waters of FREE ROAM mode. Explore an uncharted world filled with mysterious locations and captivating adventures. Confront enemies, explore the vast waters and enjoy the freedom of navigating the open sea.

Main features of the game:
- story campaign and cooperative mode for up to four players,
- open world full of dangers and challenges in free roam mode,
- advanced control system for the submarine,
- extensive combat system, faithfully recreated ship and aircraft models,
- a variety of additional activities and mini games.
nodes.short_description: Get ready for an amazing adventure in UBOAT: The Silent Wolf! Assume the role of a submarine commander from World War II, manage your vessel and navigate through treacherous waters in a thrilling STORY CAMPAIGN. Use your skills and dive into the depths in FREE ROAM mode, where you'll discover an expansive world teeming with mysteries and dangers. And if traveling alone gets boring, join the COOPERATIVE MODE and lead a group of four friends to track down enemies together!

nodes.change_log: Improvements: Added new uniforms: Radioman, Repairman, Cook, Engineer, Officer, Commander, Tropic, Pirate. Added new colors to gloves: White gloves and black gloves. Avatar shop improvements. Slightly reduced fog density in the interior. Removed Easter-related assets. Fixes: Fixed an issue with the alarm in the Conning Tower being difficult to press.

Improvements:

Added Easter Assets!
Avatar shop has been enlarged for upcoming new outfits!
Added ability to hold cigarettes in the mouth!
Added control tip posters for dynamic posters.
Improved autosteer behavior using monocular.
Improved lights in the Intro Scene.

Fixes:

Fixed texture flickering in the torpedo room.
Fixed enemy indicators display on tactical map boards.
Fixed laser misbehaving in the intro scene.
Fixed the Initial state of the no-smoking sign.
Fixed the behavior of the Manual steer switch.
Notepads now despawn when the player leaves the game.
Handles above hatches, in the control room, now act correctly in multiplayer.
